works.description: The text beginning "Barolo wines were an astonishing experience for me the first time I drank them in 1978." and continuing for various amount. http://www.londonpubclark.com/?p=4732 copies our entire page. We are put in the ridiculous situation that all these scraper sites and fake website data sites rank higher than our own website for our original copyrighted text. benjaminsblog.info/item/Italian-Barolo-(World-Vineyard)/ does a redirect to a sales page.
